# init(contentsOf:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a spatial 3D image from the contents of an image file.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(contentsOf url: URL) async throws
```

## Discussion



## Creating a spatial scene from a 2D image or spatial photo
